name: Angel of Grace
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Angel of Grace enters the battlefield, until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
{4}{W}{W}, Exile Angel of Grace from your graveyard: Your life total becomes 10.

name: Angelic Exaltation
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"If we cannot have peace, we will have justice."
—Aurelia

name: Archway Angel
oracle_text: Flying
When Archway Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each Gate you control.
flavor_text: A ray of hope breaks through the shroud of rain.

name: Arrester's Zeal
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Law is the light of civilization.

name: Bring to Trial
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "In you go, big guy. Watch your head."

name: Civic Stalwart
oracle_text: When Civic Stalwart enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "These are your streets. Defend them! This is your neighborhood. Honor it! This is your city. Save it!"

name: Concordia Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"What makes a frog lizard any worse than a bird horse? Prejudice against the Simic, that's what. It's unfair!"
—Thados Arquef, Guardian Project biomancer

name: Expose to Daylight
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.
flavor_text:
"Lies cannot long withstand the harsh light of day."
—Lavinia

name: Forbidding Spirit
oracle_text: When Forbidding Spirit enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.
flavor_text: "You will respect the dead."

name: Haazda Officer
oracle_text: When Haazda Officer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"

name: Hero of Precinct One
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor_text: When the established order falters, what remains are ordinary people and their struggle to survive.

name: Impassioned Orator
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.

name: Justiciar's Portal
oracle_text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. It gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: With the new guildmaster's innovations, arresters can arrive on the scene moments before a crime is committed.

name: Knight of Sorrows
oracle_text: Knight of Sorrows can block an additional creature each combat.
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor_text: The helmet reveals no eyes to witness your penance, no mouth to offer absolution.

name: Lumbering Battlement
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Lumbering Battlement enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nontoken creatures you control until it leaves the battlefield.
Lumbering Battlement gets +2/+2 for each card exiled with it.

name: Ministrant of Obligation
oracle_text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor_text: When the price of your sins comes due, the Church of Deals is there to collect.

name: Prowling Caracal
flavor_text: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.

name: Rally to Battle
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.
flavor_text: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.

name: Resolute Watchdog
oracle_text: Defender
{1}, Sacrifice Resolute Watchdog: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: A friend in good times, a guardian in bad times, and a savior when all else fails.

name: Sentinel's Mark
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance.
Addendum — When Sentinel's Mark enters the battlefield, if you cast it during your main phase, enchanted creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

name: Sky Tether
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and loses flying.
flavor_text:
"If you can't control your mount, I will control it for you."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Smothering Tithe
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
flavor_text:
"I await your donation."
—Dasha, Orzhov priest

name: Spirit of the Spires
oracle_text: Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1.
flavor_text: She breathes fair winds to tired griffins and lifts songbirds beyond the reach of stalking cats.

name: Summary Judgment
oracle_text: Summary Judgment deals 3 damage to target tapped creature.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, it deals 5 damage to that creature instead.
flavor_text: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.

name: Syndicate Messenger
oracle_text: Flying
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings."
—Lavinia

name: Tenth District Veteran
oracle_text: Vigilance
Whenever Tenth District Veteran attacks, untap another target creature you control.
flavor_text: "I keep reminding myself we do this because others can't, because we love this city. If we don't save it, no one will."

name: Tithe Taker
oracle_text: During your turn, spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast and abilities your opponents activate cost {1} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

name: Twilight Panther
oracle_text: {B}: Twilight Panther gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: A pet that can hunt both flesh and spirit is precious in a place where smiling assassins keep company with ghostly shadows.

name: Unbreakable Formation
oracle_text: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Watchful Giant
oracle_text: When Watchful Giant enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavor_text: Loitering is not only illegal but unwise, since those who stay too long in one place are apt to be stepped on.

name: Arrester's Admonition
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.
flavor_text: Law is the voice of reason.

name: Benthic Biomancer
oracle_text: {1}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Benthic Biomancer, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: "I am my life's work."

name: Chillbringer
oracle_text: Flying
When Chillbringer enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: If you can see your breath, it's too late to run.

name: Clear the Mind
oracle_text: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The best way to keep a secret is to forget it."
—Lazav

name: Code of Constraint
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Coral Commando
flavor_text: Few Ravnicans are aware of the vast reefs in their world's hidden ocean. Far beneath the great sinkholes, where the light is blue and dim, merfolk tend the coral labyrinths that feed the benthic ecosystem.

name: Essence Capture
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
flavor_text:
"It's not enough to defeat our foes. We must learn from them, too."
—Vannifar

name: Eyes Everywhere
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
{5}{U}: Exchange control of Eyes Everywhere and target nonland permanent. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: "They've got eyes inside my head!"

name: Faerie Duelist
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Faerie Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Faeries are easily offended and quick to exact a quirky revenge.

name: Gateway Sneak
oracle_text: Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, Gateway Sneak can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Gateway Sneak deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I've been through every guildgate in this city, and no one sees me come or go."

name: Humongulus
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Searching the city for Fblthp felt like sifting the rain for a single drop of blood.

name: Mass Manipulation
oracle_text: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
flavor_text: Those who cross the Dimir find enemies everywhere they turn.

name: Mesmerizing Benthid
oracle_text: When Mesmerizing Benthid enters the battlefield, create two 0/2 blue Illusion creature tokens with "Whenever this creature blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step."
Mesmerizing Benthid has hexproof as long as you control an Illusion.

name: Persistent Petitioners
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.
Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player puts the top twelve cards of their library into their graveyard.
A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

name: Precognitive Perception
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead scry 3, then draw three cards.
flavor_text: "To control the present we must master the future."

name: Prying Eyes
oracle_text: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.
flavor_text: "Citizen! Your crime has been recorded. Cease movement and await arrest, or further penalties will be immediately imposed."

name: Pteramander
oracle_text: Flying
{7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

name: Quench
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp."

name: Sage's Row Savant
oracle_text: When Sage's Row Savant enters the battlefield, scry 2.
flavor_text: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.

name: Senate Courier
oracle_text: Flying
{1}{W}: Senate Courier gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"This Dovin Baan came from nowhere. Watch him. Read his letters. He is more than he appears."
—Lazav

name: Shimmer of Possibility
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text:
"There's something peculiar about the rain today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker

name: Skatewing Spy
oracle_text: {5}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
flavor_text:
"A better Ravnica begins with a better Simic."
—Vannifar

name: Skitter Eel
oracle_text: {2}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text:
"Life has no mistakes, only experiments."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer

name: Slimebind
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -4/-0.
flavor_text:
"Relax. It's quite harmless. And it will dissolve completely in a month or two."
—Navona, Simic field tester

name: Sphinx of Foresight
oracle_text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, scry 3 at the beginning of your first upkeep.
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
flavor_text: "I do not understand the future I see: the guilds subverted, the world at war, armies bent to a cruel conqueror's will."

name: Swirling Torrent
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Oops!"
—Grupgrup, sluiceway technician

name: Thought Collapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I can think of no greater punishment than answering your question in full."
—Lazav

name: Verity Circle
oracle_text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card.
{4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"Here, there is only truth."
—Barvisa, Azorius emissary

name: Wall of Lost Thoughts
oracle_text: Defender
When Wall of Lost Thoughts enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: Those who intrude upon the Dimir seldom remember that they have done so.

name: Windstorm Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.
flavor_text: Drakes become especially voracious as they prepare for their autumn migration, hunting the city's thoroughfares from dawn to dusk.

name: Awaken the Erstwhile
oracle_text: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor_text: In preparation for the conflict all foresaw, the Golgari called upon an army that had slept for millennia beneath the city.

name: Bankrupt in Blood
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures.
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: "Your spirits can rest in peace, for your debts are paid."

name: Blade Juggler
oracle_text: Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

name: Bladebrand
oracle_text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance."
—Judith

name: Bloodmist Infiltrator
oracle_text: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Blood seeks blood, and nothing shall hold back its hunger.

name: Carrion Imp
oracle_text: Flying
When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: No scrap of nutrition goes to waste in the undercity.

name: Catacomb Crocodile
flavor_text:
"I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel."
"No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."
Then Croc came and ate them both.

name: Clear the Stage
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"

name: Consign to the Pit
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: First your whole life flashes before your eyes. Then you have considerable time to reflect on every regret as you plummet.

name: Cry of the Carnarium
oracle_text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.

name: Dead Revels
oracle_text: Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: You're only as dead as you feel.

name: Debtors' Transport
oracle_text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor_text: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.

name: Drill Bit
oracle_text: Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Never boring.

name: Font of Agonies
oracle_text: Whenever you pay life, put that many blood counters on Font of Agonies.
{1}{B}, Remove four blood counters from Font of Agonies: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text:
"No worthwhile reward is easily gained."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Grotesque Demise
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans."
—Ubea, Orzhov ministrant

name: Gutterbones
oracle_text: Gutterbones enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Gutterbones from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.
flavor_text:
"Down here, things don't stay dead."
—Lavinia

name: Ill-Gotten Inheritance
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: "The suffering of others is not my concern."

name: Noxious Groodion
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text:
"Behold the groodion! Ichor-slurper, oozing fiend. Foulest wonder underground. Grandest vermin of them all!"
—Zalin the Gutter Bard

name: Orzhov Enforcer
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor_text: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."

name: Orzhov Racketeers
oracle_text: Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
flavor_text: "Looks like you need protection."

name: Pestilent Spirit
oracle_text: Menace, deathtouch
Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Its stench corrodes steel. Its miasma sickens angels. Its finality ends hope.

name: Plague Wight
oracle_text: Whenever Plague Wight becomes blocked, each creature blocking it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: For some goods, the best couriers are the dead.

name: Priest of Forgotten Gods
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Any number of target players each lose 2 life and sacrifice a creature. You add {B}{B} and draw a card.
flavor_text: The Orzhov are not the only religious tradition on Ravnica, nor the oldest.

name: Rakdos Trumpeter
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{3}{R}: Rakdos Trumpeter gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The louder their performance, the quieter we become in comparison. They are the perfect distractions, for only fools ignore the Rakdos."
—Lazav

name: Spawn of Mayhem
oracle_text: Spectacle {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, Spawn of Mayhem deals 1 damage to each player. Then if you have 10 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Mayhem.

name: Spire Mangler
oracle_text: Flash
Flying
When Spire Mangler enters the battlefield, target creature with flying you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its mandibles can leave a rider in the clouds astride a headless griffin.

name: Thirsting Shade
oracle_text: Lifelink
{2}{B}: Thirsting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Your life is a blinding light, your breath a gale, your pulse a deafening drum. Be still. Be still."
—Dahlya Trul, "Irbitov Lament"

name: Undercity Scavenger
oracle_text: When Undercity Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Undercity Scavenger, then scry 2.
flavor_text:
"We grow strong by feasting on failure."
—Izoni

name: Undercity's Embrace
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: The undercity is always hungry.

name: Vindictive Vampire
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, Vindictive Vampire deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

name: Amplifire
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Until your next turn, Amplifire's base power becomes twice that card's power and its base toughness becomes twice that card's toughness. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Burn Bright
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Burning-Tree Vandal
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.

name: Cavalcade of Calamity
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Cavalcade of Calamity deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.
flavor_text: Let the Dimir worry about witnesses. For the Rakdos, screams count as applause.

name: Clamor Shaman
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Clamor Shaman attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Little goblin. Big noise."
—Ruric Thar

name: Dagger Caster
oracle_text: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
flavor_text: "Keep coming. I have knives enough for everyone."

name: Deface
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature with defender.
flavor_text:
"Leave no stone unturned."
—Ruric Thar

name: Electrodominance
oracle_text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a card with converted mana cost X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."

name: Feral Maaka
flavor_text:
"Lost are the lush meadows and verdant forests, where maaka prowled and lammasu soared. Lost are the wilds, where our hearts were free."
—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

name: Flames of the Raze-Boar
oracle_text: Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Then Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 2 damage to each other creature that player controls if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "Fire will cure a multitude of ills."

name: Gates Ablaze
oracle_text: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.
flavor_text: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.

name: Ghor-Clan Wrecker
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: "Today the Rubblebelt is a bit larger. That's a good day's work."

name: Goblin Gathering
oracle_text: Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to two plus the number of cards named Goblin Gathering in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Two's a party. Three's a felony.

name: Gravel-Hide Goblin
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Gravel-Hide Goblin gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"No peace accord will save Ravnica. You don't build on rot. You burn it down and start again."
—Domri Rade

name: Immolation Shaman
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of an artifact, creature, or land that isn't a mana ability, Immolation Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.
{3}{R}{R}: Immolation Shaman gets +3/+3 and gains menace until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Hello, kindling."

name: Light Up the Stage
oracle_text: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text:
"Places, everyone!"
—Judith

name: Mirror March
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, flip a coin until you lose a flip. For each flip you won, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Rix Maadi Reveler
oracle_text: Spectacle {2}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Rix Maadi Reveler enters the battlefield, discard a card, then draw a card. If Rix Maadi Reveler's spectacle cost was paid, instead discard your hand, then draw three cards.

name: Rubble Reading
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Gruul oracles see omens in all forms of destruction: the entrails of a maaka's prey, the flight of vultures over a battlefield, the scattering of toppled stone.

name: Rubblebelt Recluse
oracle_text: Rubblebelt Recluse attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.

name: Rumbling Ruin
oracle_text: When Rumbling Ruin enters the battlefield, count the number of +1/+1 counters on creatures you control. Creatures your opponents control with power less than or equal to that number can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The Rubblebelt grows restless.

name: Scorchmark
oracle_text: Scorchmark deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: "Have you seen your face? Trust me, this will be an improvement."

name: Skarrgan Hellkite
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Flying
{3}{R}: Skarrgan Hellkite deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Activate this ability only if Skarrgan Hellkite has a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Skewer the Critics
oracle_text: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Going to a Rakdos show is dangerous. Trying to leave early can be fatal.

name: Smelt-Ward Ignus
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Smelt-Ward Ignus: Gain control of target creature with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: "Come in, yes? Is warm!"

name: Spear Spewer
oracle_text: Defender
{T}: Spear Spewer deals 1 damage to each player.
flavor_text:
"Don't waste time aiming, you lazy gob-slug! Fire!"
—Krenko, mob boss

name: Spikewheel Acrobat
oracle_text: Spectacle {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
flavor_text: "Every street's a stage, and every screaming bystander's an audience."

name: Storm Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: "My shout is thunder and my fist is lightning!"

name: Tin Street Dodger
oracle_text: Haste
{R}: Tin Street Dodger can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with defender.
flavor_text: "That giant didn't even see me, let alone catch me! And I was close enough to smell him! Of course, that's not saying much."

name: Axebane Beast
flavor_text:
"Imagine a gigantic pine cone that's extremely territorial and always in a foul mood."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

name: Biogenic Ooze
oracle_text: When Biogenic Ooze enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each Ooze you control.
{1}{G}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.

name: Biogenic Upgrade
oracle_text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.
flavor_text:
"To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means."
—Vannifar

name: End-Raze Forerunners
oracle_text: Vigilance, trample, haste
When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Smash this city to pieces."
—Domri Rade

name: Enraged Ceratok
oracle_text: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text: "There's no time to calm it down! Run!"

name: Gatebreaker Ram
oracle_text: Gatebreaker Ram gets +1/+1 for each Gate you control.
As long as you control two or more Gates, Gatebreaker Ram has vigilance and trample.
flavor_text: So-called "battering rams" pale in comparison to the real thing.

name: Gift of Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"When the sky screams, when the ground groans, the End-Raze will soon begin."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Growth-Chamber Guardian
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Growth-Chamber Guardian, you may search your library for a card named Growth-Chamber Guardian, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Gruul Beastmaster
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Whenever Gruul Beastmaster attacks, another target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Gruul Beastmaster's power.

name: Guardian Project
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.
flavor_text: Simic's strength comes from its diversity.

name: Incubation Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce. If Incubation Druid has a +1/+1 counter on it, add three mana of that type instead.
{3}{G}{G}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

name: Mammoth Spider
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text:
"The good news is that the migrating drakes are no longer a problem."
—Bell Migellic, Azorius hussar

name: Open the Gates
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card or Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"If you don't have a destination in mind, the route is all that matters."
—Tamina, district guide

name: Rampage of the Clans
oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
flavor_text: "Rage! Rage until the whole world burns!"

name: Rampaging Rendhorn
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
flavor_text: Tumult is its natural habitat.

name: Regenesis
oracle_text: Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"When you get right down to it, the difference between death and life is just a membrane-enclosed environment maintained by a metabolic process."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

name: Root Snare
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: The roots run deep under stone and street, with strength that needs but a whisper to awaken.

name: Sagittars' Volley
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. Sagittars' Volley deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control.
flavor_text:
"My bowstring hums in tune with the song of the Worldsoul."
—Alcarus, Selesnya sagittar

name: Saruli Caretaker
oracle_text: Defender
{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "I hold the seed of our new beginning."

name: Sauroform Hybrid
oracle_text: {4}{G}{G}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
flavor_text:
"Within each of us, the potential for great power waits to be released."
—Zija, Simic mutationist

name: Silhana Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Silhana Wayfinder enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: "Stay close! It's just a little farther."

name: Steeple Creeper
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Steeple Creeper gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"If the Fin Clade cannot produce a reliable venomous krasis, mobile in both air and water, then the Guardian Project will absorb its resources."
—Vannifar

name: Stony Strength
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Untap that creature.
flavor_text: "What you build, we will destroy . . . and bury you in the rubble!"

name: Sylvan Brushstrider
oracle_text: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The mournful lowing of brushstriders warns of changing weather and ill winds.

name: Territorial Boar
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Boar gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The presence of the strong will make you stronger."
—Yeva, Nature's Herald

name: Titanic Brawl
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Whoever wins, the neighborhood loses.

name: Tower Defense
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We've been practicing for this all our lives. This is the final test!"
—Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter

name: Trollbred Guardian
oracle_text: {2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: His favorite food is kraul.

name: Wilderness Reclamation
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all lands you control.
flavor_text:
"Walls crack. Buildings fall. Always the wilds return."
—Domri Rade

name: Wrecking Beast
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample
flavor_text:
"The best construction makes the most satisfying destruction."
—Domri Rade

name: Absorb
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "In your misguided attempt to subvert the law, you have eloquently explained why the law must exist."

name: Aeromunculus
oracle_text: Flying
{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text:
"The absence of binocular vision imposes certain challenges for a flying creature, which are overcome via echolocation."
—Simic research notes

name: Applied Biomancy
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Azorius Knight-Arbiter
oracle_text: Vigilance
Azorius Knight-Arbiter can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Thanks to the magic in his Writ of Passage, alms beasts lumbered aside, anarchs bowed their heads, and even Rakdos acrobats rolled their spikewheels out of his way.

name: Azorius Skyguard
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.
flavor_text: "These new thopters are all well and good, but four eyes are better than none."

name: Basilica Bell-Haunt
oracle_text: When Basilica Bell-Haunt enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: You can hear their tolling only when your debt is due.

name: Bedevil
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger."
—Tajic

name: Biomancer's Familiar
oracle_text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.
{T}: The next time target creature adapts this turn, it adapts as though it had no +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Bolrac-Clan Crusher
oracle_text: {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Bolrac-Clan Crusher deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Jaharg discovered that the shapes and symmetries so pleasing to the sculptor's eye also yielded a well-balanced bludgeon.

name: Captive Audience
oracle_text: Captive Audience enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Your life total becomes 4.
• Discard your hand.
• Each opponent creates five 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

name: Cindervines
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Cindervines deals 1 damage to that player.
{1}, Sacrifice Cindervines: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cindervines deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

name: Clan Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
{2}{G}, {T}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

name: Combine Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{G}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto another target creature you control.

name: Cult Guildmage
oracle_text: {3}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
{R}, {T}: Cult Guildmage deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

name: Deputy of Detention

name: Domri, Chaos Bringer
oracle_text: +1: Add {R} or {G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains riot. (It enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
−3: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

oracle_text: +1: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on Dovin, Grand Arbiter.
−1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life.
−7: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Dovin's Acuity
oracle_text: When Dovin's Acuity enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
Whenever you cast an instant spell during your main phase, you may return Dovin's Acuity to its owner's hand.

name: Emergency Powers
oracle_text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Emergency Powers.

name: Ethereal Absolution
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.

—Kaya, to Teysa

name: Final Payment
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 5 life or sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Destroy target creature.

oracle_text: Haste
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, Fireblade Artist deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

name: Frenzied Arynx
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample
{4}{R}{G}: Frenzied Arynx gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Frilled Mystic
oracle_text: Flash
When Frilled Mystic enters the battlefield, you may counter target spell.
flavor_text: "Your arrival was expected . . . and unwelcome."

name: Galloping Lizrog

"I might have overfed him."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

name: Get the Point
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Scry 1.

oracle_text: Flying
When Grasping Thrull enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Debt due! Debt due!" The thrull's screeching makes children flinch and debtors quail. "Debt due!"

name: Growth Spiral
oracle_text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Gruul Spellbreaker
oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)
Trample
As long as it's your turn, you and Gruul Spellbreaker have hexproof.
flavor_text: She displays her scars with pride.

name: Gyre Engineer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}{U}.
flavor_text: "As I contemplate what is, I dive ever deeper into the depths of possibility. Then I set an experiment in motion and watch the truth rise to the surface."

name: Hackrobat
oracle_text: Spectacle {B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
{B}: Hackrobat gains deathtouch until end of turn.
{R}: Hackrobat gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

name: High Alert
oracle_text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

{2}{W}{U}: Untap target creature.

Flying, trample
Hydroid Krasis enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Imperious Oligarch
oracle_text: Vigilance
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
flavor_text: The rights of ghosts are strictly protected under Orzhov bylaws, and those who enforce them can count on the ghosts' assistance.

name: Judith, the Scourge Diva
oracle_text: Other creatures you control get +1/+0.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Judith, the Scourge Diva deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: At the end of the show, she stands alone on a stage brilliant with blood.

name: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper
oracle_text: +1: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way.
−1: Exile target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 1 or less.

oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.

Afterlife 3 (When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

name: Lavinia, Azorius Renegade

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

name: Lawmage's Binding
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature

name: Macabre Mockery

name: Mortify
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text:

name: Nikya of the Old Ways

Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

name: Prime Speaker Vannifar
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

oracle_text: When Rakdos Firewheeler enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.

name: Rubblebelt Runner

name: Savage Smash
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: A Gruul berserker is never unarmed.

oracle_text: {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Rubble Slinger

name: Deploy (Depose/Deploy)
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

name: Incubation (Incubation/Incongruity)
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Incongruity (Incubation/Incongruity)
oracle_text: Exile target creature. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

name: Repudiate (Repudiate/Replicate)
oracle_text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

name: Replicate (Repudiate/Replicate)
oracle_text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.

name: Revival (Revival/Revenge)
oracle_text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Revenge (Revival/Revenge)
oracle_text: Double your life total. Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

name: Thrash (Thrash/Threat)
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
